column1: Smoque BBQ////This place is awesome.  My wife is from the South and everywhere I had taken her for bbq was not up to snuff.  Until this place.  We love the pulled pork sandwiches
column2: the St. Louis style ribs and the Texas sausage.  The cole slaw is crisp and not a creamy mess like other places.  As for the fries
column3: I would go there for them even if they didn't have the 'que. On a summer weekend the line will typically go out the door and down the side of the building. There are few places I would are worth the wait
column4: but this is one of them.
